name: CLR BK
description: Balanced compensator offering moderate recoil reduction with minimal ergonomics penalty

name: CLR HiHeat
description: High-performance compensator with superior recoil reduction at the cost of ergonomics
tips: Best-in-class recoil control for high-end builds, worth the ergonomics trade-off

name: Aug 5.56x45 adpator

tips: Required adapter for AUG builds - enables access to other compensators and muzzle devices

name: COOKI
description: Premium compensator offering maximum recoil reduction with significant ergonomics penalty
tips: Legendary tier - use when recoil control is absolutely critical and you can manage the ergo hit

name: DMR Compensator
description: Heavy-duty compensator designed for designated marksman rifles and precision shooting
tips: Ideal for single-shot and semi-auto builds where weight penalty is acceptable

name: ATK1
description: Entry-level compensator with asymmetric recoil reduction favoring vertical control
tips: Budget-friendly option that prioritizes vertical recoil over horizontal - good for spray patterns

name: ATK2
description: Lightweight compensator offering balanced recoil reduction with minimal weight penalty
tips: Excellent choice for mobile builds where weight matters - solid performance with low penalties

name: Sugar Lump
description: Advanced compensator with excellent recoil control and no ergonomics penalty
tips: Rare find with no downsides - prioritize acquiring this for versatile builds

name: Rifle Compensator
description: Standard rifle compensator providing basic recoil reduction for general use
tips: Reliable baseline option when other compensators aren't available or budget is tight

name: Viper09
description: High-tier compensator with exceptional recoil control but affects headshot damage and ADS speed
tips: Best raw recoil reduction but consider the headshot damage penalty for your playstyle

name: Suppressor
description: Unique QDL suppressor with damage bonuses but complex handling modifications
tips: Was not found in the ExfilZone AFAIK

name: H200 FlashLight
description: H200 tactical flashlight providing 15m illumination with moderate ergonomics penalty
tips: Standard flashlight choice - good illumination range but adds recoil penalty for visibility benefit

name: Laser
description: Category: AttachmentAttaches to: Rifles,SMGs,Snipers.

name: Laser
description: Category: AttachmentAttaches to: Rifles,SMGs,Snipers.
